item.description:
For the next couple of weeks, let's try a new spot for our weekly dose of trivia, and switch up the nights to Monday! (Yes, I have a one track mind)

Spats near the corner of Thayer and Angell Streets on the East Side has pub trivia that starts at 9pm.

Meet at 8 for dinner/drinks and hang out for the trivia to start at 9pm. It shouldn't be too crowded with the Brown students evacuating town for the next month! Hopefully the snow storms will have moved on and parking on the street will be allowed.

The players last week earned top prize ($25), which will be used toward this weeks bill.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to have a sign on a table.
item.name: Trivia Addicts Unite @ Spats
